name: LibraMix
description:
This mix was under LibMix but I think it is good enough and should be standing alone. The style is more flexible.

WARNING: It can do NSFW imgs.
A mix of Rev Animated v1.0, PerfectWorldv2, AOM3, Protogen v2.2 anime, Babes, CamelliaMix_2.5D, dalcefo_painting. Even though I didn't get the result that I wanted to, but I think it's a decent model, so I share it with everyone here. All preview images are t2i + hires.fix without any inpainting. It's kind of a mix of 2.5D and painting models, and have to use hires.fix for good results.

All preview images are generated with below settings:

  • VAE: [vae-ft-mse-840000-ema-pruned]

  • Clip Skip: 2

  • Sampling method: SDE Karras

  • Sampling steps: 30

  • Hires.fix: on

  • Upscaler: [R-ESRGAN 4x+] or [Remacri Upscaler]

    Hires steps: 10-12

  • Denoising strength: (0.4 - 0.5)

  • Upscale by: 2

  • WxH: 512x768

  • CFG Scale: 5 (5 - 7.5)

Check preview for negative prompt and embedding that I may use. Prompts are randomly picked up from Civitai and generated on the time of posting this model.

meta.prompt:
realistic, best quality, 8k uhd, dslr, soft lighting, high quality, film grain, Fujifilm XT3,
(close up, from directly above), Edgy girl, dark orange jacket, white sneaker, platinum blonde hair color, ponytail, dramatic makeup, piecing, (nighttime, dark city), neon signs, individuality, authenticity, creative expression,
camera, computer, books, messy room, rooftop apartment
